dishes.name: Pa amb tomàquet
dishes.description: Bread with tomato and olive oil, typically served as an accompaniment to any meal or as an appetizer.

dishes.name: Escudella i carn d'olla
dishes.description: Meat and vegetable stew, typically served on cold winter days.

dishes.name: Fricandó
dishes.description: Beef stew with mushrooms and almond sauce.

dishes.name: Coca de recapte
dishes.description: Bread dough with tomato, peppers, onion, and sardines, among other ingredients.

dishes.name: Crema catalana
dishes.description: Typical dessert made with milk, egg yolks, sugar, and cinnamon, which is caramelized on the surface.

dishes.name: Panellets
dishes.description: Almond sweets typical of the All Saints' Day holiday, covered with pine nuts, coconut, chocolate, etc.
